name: North Georgia Aviation
about: North Georgia Aviation, founded in 2019, is a comprehensive, technology and safety-focused Part 61 flight training facility located at Lee Gilmer Memorial Airport in Gainesville, GA. As a certified Cirrus Training Center, we offer the full spectrum of flight training, from private pilot certification to commercial aviation and flight instructor training. Our instructors, many of whom are CSIPs and TCIs, are passionate and knowledgeable about Cirrus Aircraft and committed to enhancing the industry with well-trained, safety-oriented pilots. With a strong focus on safety, proficiency, and a family-oriented environment, we provide enrichment, continual education, and a supportive community for all our students. Our goal is to help you achieve your aviation dreams in a safe and proficient manner. Join us at North Georgia Aviation and embark on a journey to new heights.
services: ["Flight School Programs\nCirrus Aircraft Training\nOwner Aircraft Training"]
